review: It's awesome for cord cutters - we got rid of our cable a while ago and had plugged in a kindle to the TV with an HDMI cable, then I heard about the Fire Stick and decided that for the price it was worth a try. The only problem I have had is with the Hulu app, it stutters and sometimes quits, sometimes the picture goes out but you can still hear sound. I think this is probably a hulu app problem and not the fire stick because Netflix and Amazon Prime work perfectly. I love the Fire stick app on my phone too, it controls everything and even has voice search! If they could fix the Hulu app, this would be 5 stars.
